name: blackroad-os-web

envVars.name: BR_SERVICE_NAME
envVars.description: Identifier propagated to beacons and logs for correlation.

envVars.name: BR_ENV
envVars.description: Deployment environment (dev, stage, prod) used for routing and config selection.

envVars.name: BR_BEACON_ENDPOINT
envVars.description: URL for publishing health beacons (operator/core will ingest).

envVars.name: PORT
envVars.description: Port exposed by the web server within the Railway container.

envVars.name: NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL
envVars.description: Client-visible API base URL for SPA calls (no secret tokens).

notes: Static-first web served via Pages; Railway template covers SSR previews and fallback hosting.
